function onLoad()
   self.interactable = false
end

function filterObjectEnter(obj)
    if obj.getName() == "Card I" then
        return true
    end

end

    local val = 7

      width = 0,

    end

end

ObjectStates.Name: Custom_Token
ObjectStates.LuaScript:
LOCAL_DEBUG = false
if Global.getVar('DEBUG_VAR') ~= 0 then
    LOCAL_DEBUG = true
end

function onLoad()
   self.interactable = false
end

function onCollisionExit(collider)
    -- local collGuid = collider.collision_object.getGUID()
    if LOCAL_DEBUG == true then
        print('LOCAL_DEBUG is true')
    end
    
    local tbltBnds = self.getBounds()
    local tbltObj = Physics.cast({
        origin = self.getPosition(),
        direction = {0, 0.3, 0},
        type = 3,
        size = tbltBnds['size'],
        max_distance = 0.3,
        debug = LOCAL_DEBUG
    })
    local cardTbl = {}
    local objBttns = self.getButtons()
    for _, r in ipairs(tbltObj) do
        local objName = r.hit_object.getName()
        if objName:match('Card I+') then
            table.insert(cardTbl, r.hit_object)
        end
    end
    
    if objBttns ~= nil and #cardTbl == 0 then
        self.clearButtons()
    end
end
